description: A simple test PRD to verify Ralph orchestra functionality

userStories.title: Create a greeting utility
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a greeting utility function so that I can easily greet users
acceptanceCriteria: Export a function `greet(name: string): string` that returns 'Hello, {name}!'

userStories.title: Create a farewell utility
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a farewell utility function so that I can say goodbye to users
acceptanceCriteria: Export a function `farewell(name: string): string` that returns 'Goodbye, {name}!'
userStories.notes: Simple utility function - independent of US-001

userStories.title: Create a combined message utility
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to combine greeting and farewell into a session message
acceptanceCriteria: Export a function `sessionMessage(name: string): string` that combines both
